resources.string: Add list of all track on the phone. User can click on any item in the list to play it.
Albums Use list to display albums. When user click on artist start playing tracks in album.
This is playlist screen. Here is list of all playlist created and floating button to create new playlist. When user click on playlist it starts playing tracks in it.
This is store screen. I woud try to open google play in this activity with music that user can buy.
